name: Brick's Revenge (C64)
description:
This game is designed for the Commodore 64, you will need to play it an an emulator or transfer to a real C64. Both PRG and D64 files are included.

Story:
After many years of abuse at the hands of bats and balls the Brick's have had enough. They have now declared war on the world of bats and you are one of the last hopes to hold back their army!

Controls:
Joystick In Port 2.
Left and Right to move the paddle.
Hold fire to move faster.

Gameplay:
On each of the 12 levels you must smash enough bricks to open up the goal zone and then fire a ball into that zone to advance.
Dropping the ball won't kill you immediately but if you miss it 3 times in a row you will lose a life.
You will also lose a life if hit by a kamikaze brick, laser fire, missiles or the giant brick.

Credits
Programming and graphics by Stuart Garnham
Music and SFX by Mike Richmond
